title: Modern Italian Alpine Retreat Overlooking Gran Becca with Day Spa, Sauna & Restaurants
description: Along the slopes of the Gran Becca stands this charming Italian Alps retreat, an architectural structure blending harmoniously with the natural landscape. Spend days exploring the snow-capped peaks and then retreat to the warmth of the onsite Panorama Restaurant for traditional Italian cuisine and impeccable mountain views. Throughout your stay, savour traditional Valdostan dishes at Abri Restaurant and enjoy sipping on a warming drink at the intimate lounge bar, Zero. For those seeking relaxation, the state-of-the-art wellness centre offers a range of calming treatments, from the steamy sauna to the rejuvenating pool.
